name: Electra Long Sleeve T-shirt
description:
Keep warm this winter in style with Buffalo Airwear's new long sleeve tee!
Due to the popularity of our new Buffalo Airways Electra print we decided to make a Long Sleeve version. 

This 100% cotton long sleeve shirt is black with white contrast top stitching. 

Size range Small to 4 Extra Large.

Measurements are in inches. (Chest at under arms, length front front neck line to hem and arm length at underarm seam). 

              Chest            Length          Sleeve

S               18                 26                  18.5
M               20                27                  19.5
L               22                 28                   21
XL             24                 29                   22
2XL           26                 29                   22
3XL           28                 30                   22
4XL           30                 30                   22

name: Electra Short Sleeve Tee
description:
Brand NEW to the Buffalo Airwear store!!!

We wanted to bring in a new Electra tee and decided to show off our L-188 XFC (formerly Atlantic Airline L-188) and print this great front view t-shirt. 

We printed on the same great 100% cotton tees that you love from Buffalo. 
 
Available in sizes Small to 5XL there is a shirt to fit everyone!

name: Classic DC-3 Green Hoodie
description:
They're back! The Buffalo Classic DC-3 Green Hoodie!

We have finally decided to bring back in the Green Classic tee print on a Buffalo Green Hoodie. 

A high quality green coloured cotton  hoodie has the art deco DC-3 image in black and white. This stylized hoodie will have you looking your best in the traditional Buffalo green.  

 GO GREEN WITH BUFFALO!

Sizes in inches:
(Width/Length)

S:19/22
M:21/24
L:24/27
XL:26/29
2XL:28/31
3XL:31/32

name: Buffalo Trip Carrier
description:
Now Available the Buffalo Trip Bag!

We wanted to introduce a different kind of bag to the Buffalo Airwear line. We found this great dark olive waxed canvas side bag with leather time and antique brass hard wear.

The Trip Bag is a perfect fit for all your travel accessories including your iPad, cell phone and e-reader.  The main storage compartment of this bag has two small pockets perfect for a cell phone, and inside zipper pocket for travel documents. There is one front and back outside pockets big enough for extra electronics or books.

We have ordered a small number of these bags so be sure to get yours quick before they sell out.

name: Buffalo Trapper Hat
description:
Brand new item to the Buffalo Airwear store! 

We have just received some brand new Choko made Nylon trapper hats with fun fur trim and Buffalo Airways classic logo on each side. 

This hat has plastic buckle clip at chin to keep the faux fur ear flaps sung to your face. 

Made by Choko these hats will keep your noggin warm even in the -30 temps. 

 Hat available in sizes: 
XS/S
M/L
XL

name: Buffalo Work Shirt
description:
Buffalo Work Shirts are here. 

We have brought in a small number of these spruce green 65% Polyester 35% Cotton  shirts to see if they will sell.  This shirt is a button down, short sleeve with two front pockets and button closure. 

We wanted to keep them looking like a classic mechanic shirt so we kept it simple with a Buffalo Logo crest sewn above the pocket.

Sorry if we don't currently have you size we bought in a very small number of these shirt to test the market and are planning to get some more in for the new year.

name: Navy Northern Night Set
description:
The Navy Northern Night Set is now available! 

With the release of our Ladies Navy V-neck we thought that we would offer a Navy Northern Night Set. Get these two great great ladies designs at a savings. With complimentary DC-3 flying design and buffalo logo/ back print this set is perfect sleeping in. 
This Cotton tee shirt and Tight set is breathable and comfortable.

name: DVD set Ice Pilots NWT Season 1-4
description:
Season 4 has finally arrived, just in time before Season 5 is launched on the History Television Network in Canada!

Get your copies of all current season 1, 2, 3, and 4. 

Omni Film has done a spectacular job of putting together all the seasons on DVD. These 3 disc sets are packaged in a hard plastic case and contain all episodes and extra footage. 

We have removed the shrink wrap from the packages so that we could include some extras. If you want to get your copy(s) signed by Joe and/or Mikey please add a note to your order and we will track them down (NOTE: this request may add several days to the shipping of your order). 

IMPORTANT NOTE: The Ice Pilots DVD is produced as a “Region Neutral” DVD able to play in all countries and players.

name: Ladies YZFleece
description:
We wanted to introduce a modern cut to our ladies line. This 7.6 oz, 100% polyester anti-pill micro fleece has set-in sleeves with open cuffs and thumbholes and 2-panel hood with polyester spandex binding. Our new fleece also has gently contoured silhouette with princess seams and front pockets with polyester tricot lining. 

Keeping with the simpler fit we branded our fleece with the simple Buffalo Airways logo down the left front panel.

We have ordered a limited number of our new fleece to test our  ladies market. Be sure to order your quick to get the size that you would like. 

Special mention goes to Patrick who helped us name our YZFleece after the Yellowknife airport code (YZF). - Thanks Patrick!

name: Ice Pilots Season DVDs
description:
Season 4 has finally arrived, just in time before Season 5 is launched on the History Television Network in Canada!

Omni Film has done a spectacular job of putting together all the seasons on DVD. These 3 disc sets are packaged in a hard plastic case and contain all episodes and extra footage. 

We have removed the shrink wrap from the packages so that we could include some extras. If you want to get your copy(s) signed by Joe and/or Mikey please add a note to your order and we will track them down (NOTE: this request may add several days to the shipping of your order). 

IMPORTANT NOTE: The Ice Pilots DVD is produced as a “Region Neutral” DVD able to play in all countries and players.

name: Ladies Buffalo Navy V-Neck
description:
This is the newest edition to our Ladies Buffalo Airwear line. This fitted ladies tee is made from 100% soft style cotton. This v-neck tee is not too low and  fitted just enough to give a flattering curve.
 
We decided to take two of our best selling logos and combine them into a dynamite tee. We printed the front with our ladies DC-3 cloud print to compliment the neck line. The back has been printed with the statement Buffalo Airways logo.  

The navy color is flattering on anyone and is perfect to wear with a pair of jeans. Ladies, make sure to order yours before their gone. Men, make sure to add one to your order so the woman in your life can wear a little Buffalo too. 

This flattering style is sure to sell quick.

name: Ltd Edition Sunrise Tee
description:
We had such a great feed back from the rough art for the Sunrise Tee that we thought that we would make it a limited edition shirt. We bought high quality, 100% cotton shirts and printed them with the iconic DC-3 and Midnight Sun. To make it officially a one of a kind we put our Ltd Ed. trade mark on the sleeve. 

We only had 145 of the tees made so get this collector item while they are available. 

Stay tuned for more Ltd. Edition designs in the future.

name: Yoga Jacket
description:
With the success of the Yoga Pants we wanted to make a Yoga Jacket that would be form fitting but classic enough to wear every day. Working once again with our Canadian manufacturing friends at Cottentex we designed a fantastic match to the Yoga Pants.

Just like the Yoga Pants the Yoga Jackets are 95% cotton and 5% spandex, making them breatheable, soft and just a little bit of stretch; perfect for comfort, whether working-out or walking about. We kept any extras to a minimum with just the embroidered Buffalo brand on the left chest, the same green fabric and colour as the waistband of the Yoga Pants down the sides, a short zip-up collar and two zippered pockets to hold your valuables. 

Sizes range from Xtra Small to Double Xtra Large. 

Chest sizes 
 
XS - 32" S - 36" M -  38" L -  40" XL - 42" XXL - 44"

Length

XS - 21" S - 22" M - 24" L - 26" XL - 28" XXL - 30"

name: Buffalo Metal/Enamel Keychain
description:
Carry Buffalo with you everywhere you go, with the new Buffalo Keychain. 

This new design features the Buffalo Brand on one side and the emerging Buffalo Stamp design on the other. The colouring is a simple sliver on black. 

We made this at home in Canada to bring you the best quality products possible.

name: Original Ice Road Trucker Hoodie
description:
On the ice road the days and nights can get a little chilly. 
Don't get caught in the cold, This pull over hoodie design will keep you warm and stylish ( who says you have to choose one or the other?)
 
We've sported this design in a T-Shirt and we couldn't risk that you would want to cover that up, so we kept it simple but eye catching again.
 
The light blue interior on the hoodie matches the font and the colour of the ice you might be driving over at any minute.
 
Don't be caught in the cold without one.

name: Original Ice Road Trucker Belt Buckle
description:
The newest addition to our Trucker Merchandise is a copper plated pewter belt buckle. 

Measuring 3.5 inches across its big enough to flaunt but not so much that it'll dig into your turkey belly when Christmas is over.

Completed with Alex's Signature on the back this has the Original Ice Road Trucker's seal of approval.

name: Original Ice Road Trucker Charcoal Hat
description:
This new hat is a faux- oil skin hat. The fabric has a unique feel and texture that is a little something different. 

With a newly designed patch on the front, Canadian and American Flags on the back and the OIRT name on the back its a nice hat that stands out without screaming for attention.

name: Toddler Tee
description:
All of our 1zee wearers are growing up, so we had to bring in a new tee to keep them proudly wearing the Buffalo Brand. 

This simple grey tee shows off the latest buffalo stamp design with the DC-3 outline. 

We have this style in sport grey and light blue.

name: Mobile Wallet
description:
This unique invention allow you to carry your important cards right on your phone in a slimline package, and it's branded with the Buffalo logo.

With this silcone rubber wallet sticks to phones and cases and is removeable without leaving a mark. The size is 57 x91 mm.

This wallet will allow you to carry just what is needed with your phone and not increase the bulk in your jacket, trousers or purse.

We recommend that you add this as an extra item, rather than shipping alone, to keep the cost down.

name: Reversible Hoodie
description:
Working with our friends at Icerock we came up with a new thick hoodie design. We wanted to take the success of the current hoodie designs and put them together into a more weather friendly reversible, warm and stylish garment. This is actually two hoodies sewn together, complete with a two-way zipper and double hood strings.

We went with an applique design on the front of the black side and a screen print on the green back side, the best of both worlds. The reversible design allows you to flip it to black because as we know, it's not always easy being green. 

Sizing Chart
            Body Length     Chest Width
XS        26.5                  19.5
S          27.5                  20.5
M         28.5                   21.5
L          29.5                  22.5
XL        30.5                  23.5
XXL      31.5                  24.5
3XL      32.5                  25.5

name: Electra Passport Stamp Tee
description:
This new design celebrates Buffalo's youngest plane. The L-188 Lockheed Electra. 

The plane is displayed on the front of this tee with the familiar design. The Electra logo is displayed across the shoulders on the back. 

The simple look of this design reflects the simplicity of the Electra's paint job.

name: Linocut Prints
description:
Local artist Dianne Mercredi has done two limited edition linocut prints for us at Buffalo Airways. 

Tibbet to Contwoyto is a celebration of the ice road truckers who help to keep the mines productive in the NWT.

Fly Boys - North of 60 is a piece about Buffalo's DC-3 sched and cargo transport in the NWT.

These are limited edition signed copies, only 250 were made. Order your copy of Dianne's great prints and own a little piece of NWT art and history.

These come framed for $80.00 or unframed for $42.00

name: Collectors Glass and Coaster Set
description:
**Note that overseas shipping charges reflect UPS prices guaranteed to arrive within 3 business days.
Canadian and US orders will be sent through Canada Post.

Our latest product is now on the shelves. 
A four set of glasses with coordinating coasters. 

Each 20oz glass is etched with an image displaying 1 of the four planes in the buffalo fleet; Electra, DC-4, C-46,and the DC-3
The opposite side is etched with the Buffalo Logo.

The set includes 4 pewter coasters with matching images of each plane. 

We have a limited quantity of 100 sets. Don't miss out on this great Buffalo Collector's item. We are sure they will go quickly.

name: SOS DVD
description:
Our snowmobiling dare-devil athlete friend from Yellowknife, David England, dropped off some DVDs for sale. We are trying to help David in training to compete across North America.

Get your limited edition, signed copy of the SOS (Syndicate of Snow) showcasing a new breed of snowmobile athletes in action on the slopes in the Yukon and British Columbia. You will not be disappointed.

Help us help David show his skills competitively.

name: Airside Hat
description:
Sorry if you have missed buying this great hat. It is currently sold out but we are expecting some new stock in the new year. Please check out some of our other great hats!!

Always working to bring in new items, we introduce the Airside Hat. 

The new design sports the Buffalo name running up the front with the Buffalo logo in the right rear. 

Contrast silver stitching and silver under the brim pop. 

Order yours today!

name: Scarf & Toque Set
description:
Use Discount Code HATS20 to get 20% off this item!!

We were searching for a great Buffalo branded scarf and toque set made in Canada and our manufacturers hit this one out of the park. 

The scarf and toque set are double wall knitted out of merino wool and acrylic mix to provide the best quality images and warmth. These are easy to care for and heavy weight. The toque is made to fit almost every head and the scarf is 55" long.

Get yours before the season is over and they are all gone.

name: Retro Hoodie
description:
We have switched the hoodie to a Canadian made garment by the same manufacturer as our famous Icon, Commando and Zip Icon hoodies. We have been so happy with their other product that we wanted to improve this popular design.

We have had requests for a traditional zip up hoodie with front pockets and we listen to our customers. We decided to do something different and had our screen printing friends emboss the chest with a large green buffalo and place our logo along the sleeves. The printing is done with a distressed look to give the impression that this has been worn for years as a favourite piece of clothing, like we know it will be. 

The zipper makes this hoodie a more versatile piece of clothing. It’s now easier to get at what’s under the hood without pulling it over your head. It’s that much easier to reveal the Buffalo inside.

Size Measurements: (length x width) 
Small 25.5" x 21" Medium 26.5" x 23" Large 27.75" x 25" X-Large 28.5" x 27" 2XL 29.25" x 29"

name: Northern Sled Suit
description:
We wanted a uni-sex sled suit for our active fans who love to be outdoors and stay warm. Working with Choko/Icerock we branded this sleek and understated sled suit. 

Get a suit set to stay warm this winter, whether you are on the trail with the dogs or riding a snow machine. They will also work for ice fishing, walking the dogs, cross country skiing or snowshoeing. 
 
Shell: • 300D textured polyester technically coated for a softer finish.
Lining jacket & pants : • 100% nylon stitched to 8oz Ultra soft poly-fill.

Functional features jacket : 
• Reflective trim for increased safety. • Inner storm flap. • Fleece lined back and collar. • Zippered outer shell pockets lined with waterproofed brushed cotton lining. • Elasticized cuffs. • Elongated back, adjustable elasticized wind-stopper. Cord with pulleys at hips and waist line.

Functional features pants : 
• Welded seams with additional waterproof nylon seat liner. • Fleece lined knees for extra warmth. • Two way full length side zippers and zippered utility pocket. • Inner storm cuff. • Adjustable elasticized suspenders •  Elongated back.

(Chest Measurement at underarm level, length is top of front zipper to bottom, arm length is underarm seam)

          Chest            Front Length       Arm Length       Inseam
M:          26"                  28"                    21"                 29"
L:           27"                  29"                    22"                 30"
XL:         29"                  30"                    23"                 31"
2XL:       31"                  31"                    23"                 31"

name: DC-3 Flight Jacket
description:
Another great design with our friends at CDI/Icerock clothing. We wanted to have a traditionally styled flight jacket simply branded with the Buffalo logo and brand. 

These jackets are a comfortable fit and very stylish. They will keep you warm whether you are on the ground or in the air.

• Heavy Duty Nylon Twill with DWR surface coating 
• Snake Quilted Twill lining 
• 200 Gram DuPontTM Sorona® polyfill
• Brass Zippers 
• Detachable Faux-Fur Collar

Size Small to 3XL

Please note that because of the weight of the jacket any orders being shipped outside of North America are sent via UPS. (which results in the high shipping cost)

name: EXTREME CORDURA PANTS
description:
The perfect pant compliment to the Buffalo Adventurer Jacket. The Extreme Cordura Pant is Canadian outerwear company, Choko, top of the line snow pants. 

 Shell : SUPPRATECH 400-denier waterproof, breathable, rugged Oxford nylon with a Teflon protective finish, technically coated for a softer feel.

Lining : DuPont Thermolite quilted to a top quality nylon lining with a special backing for shape retention. Great thermal factor with a comfortable fit! Features additional front and back waterproof breathable liners with welded seams, triple padded knee patches, with poly-fleece seat and knees for extra warmth and inner storm cuffs.

Functional features : Adjustable suspenders. Zippered outer shell pockets lined with heavy duty nylon. Cordura seat and knees. 2 full length two-way side zippers. Bottom leg external storm flaps with reflective trim, back leg patches for added security and additional bottom front Cordura protection. Padded upper stretch bubble back for easy movement and added warmth.

90-75PN000 BLACK xs to 3x BLACK

name: Northern Tights - Blue Ladies Panties
description:
The success of the Buffalo Ladies panties has led to quite a few requests for a new style. So we thought that we would chose a nice  95% cotton/5% spandex shortie style and print something classy on the front. 

We thought that it would make a great bed time outfit if combined with the Ladies Fitted Blue/Navy Ringer tee or Ladies V-Neck Navy tee

The Bella Canvas shortie only comes in sizes ranging from small to large. We are working on getting a similar style in larger sizing ... hopefully.

name: Die Cast C-GWIR DC-3
description:
HELP BRING C-GWIR BACK TO THE FLEET. WE HAVE KNOCKED ANOTHER $10.00 OFF THE MODEL AND TEE SET FOR A LIMITED TIME - GET YOUR COLLECTOR DIE CAST TODAY BEFORE THEY ARE ALL GONE!

The second collector die cast model DC-3 has arrived! We partnered again with the great people at Gemini Jets to create the 1:200 scale version of C-GWIR and they have done a spectacular job. 

We maintained the same collector styled box, but with a few changes: The cover art has C-GWIR, each box contains an individually numbered collector card certifying the model and we included a wooden/aluminium stand. 

We now have them in-stock and want to make some room in the stock room, so we have a limited special which includes one of our best selling tees, the Classic DC-3 Tee (in your size choice) and a great sale price!

Order yours now and we will get it into the mail today! 
(we cannot guarantee arrival for Christmas, but we will do our best).

name: DC-3 Draft Hoodie
description:
The Draft cutomers made us bring it back! 

This quality cotton zip-up hoodie is simply printed with the schematic of the DC-3. We had it re-made in sizes ranging from small to 3 XL.

This hoodie could save your life!
If there is a brown-out or a huge sun spot in the near future at least you will have the blueprint of one of the best made aircraft on your tee shirt. You can gather up your neighbours and friends to help build a DC-3 to fly out. 

Size Measurements:   
             Small Medium Large  X-Large  2XL   3XL
Length  24"    25"        26 "       27"       28"  29.5" 
Width    23"    24"       25"        26"        28"  29"

name: Yoga Pants
description:
In our continuing effort to bring some desirable ladies clothing to the Buffalo line we had these new yoga pants made in Canada!

These cotton, black leg pants have only 3% spandex, just enough to keep them where you need them as you work-out, stretch through your moves or just laze about around the house. We added the green waistband to complement the pants in both a traditional and new style. 

Like all of the other ladies clothing we kept the branding simple and elegant. With the Buffalo Airways logo printed in distressed style on the right leg and the brand on the waistband.

Let us know what you think about this new addition to our Airwear line. Grab a pair and stretch into your style.

Stay tuned as we add a few more pictures 

Sizing Chart


           OutSeam       Waist
XS        37inch           24
S          35inch           26 
M         36inch           28 
L          36inch           30
XL        37.5inch        32
XXL      39inch           34

name: Ladies Fitted Blue/Navy Ringer
description:
Now Only $20CAD (only size Large left) 

This tee was designed as another addition to our BuffaloGirl Line. The fitted tee gives it a cleaner look for women than the unisex line.
The design was made to look like an old passport stamp, the highly distressed look makes it look like it was at one point a well used stamp. We also had them print it so some places in the print are darker or lighter like a stamp would be.

The placement of the image is asymmetrical and adds another level to the dynamic look we tried to give this design

name: Buffalo Branded Recycled Bag
description:
Way Up Here we are not allowed to give away plastic or paper bags with purchase. As the retailer we must pay $0.25 for each bag and charge the customer to reclaim the cost ... well after much thought and a great deal of research we have come up with a solution - Buffalo Branded Recycled Bag.

We wanted it to be large enough for our customers to re-use for all of their other 'bag' needs. This bag is 13.75” W x 16.25” H x 7.25” D and made from non woven 90 gram polypropylene . 

We think that you will love this soft touch tote that is great for shopping or travelling. We made sure to keep the cost low so that everyone could afford to have a Buffalo Branded Re-usable Bag.

name: Chocolate Cloud Ladies Tee
description:
This new addition to our ladies line is made with 100% Organic cotton, designed to look good and be good for all. 

The design is simple and girly to complement, confined to a one area print, the tee doesn't overpower, and with the logo on the arm, everyone will still know you're sporting Buffalo. 

The colour is complementary to most wardrobes, after all Brown is the new Black. 

We have plenty in stock but expect them to go fast. Order yours today ladies, the more you buy the more female friendly designs we will bring in.

name: Black Ice Jacket
description:
The success of the winter jackets last year led to the production of a lighter, hooded jacket. Here is our new Black Ice Jacket.

The outside of the jacket is made with Bonded Nylon DWR coated nylon with windproof/waterproof membrane and Micro-Fleece lining. The jackets are water repellent and still breathable, ideal for aerobic activity. Every jacket comes with zippered pockets, an attached, adjustable hood with adjustable elastic draw cord hem.

We wanted to be subtle with the Buffalo branding so we went with a black on black print. This printing is light reflective screenprint so that the logo will be seen on the road, tarmack or at your favourite watering hole. 

NOTE: THIS IS A JACKET AND NOT A SAFETY VEST. THE REFLECTIVE NATURE OF THE SCREENPRINT IS NOT MEANT AS SAFETY STRIPING, BUT RATHER AS A DECORATIVE ADDITION TO THE JACKET.

Sizing chart:

           Chest                 Front zipper length           Underarm Seam 

XS:         19"                             24"                                20"
S:           21"                             24"                                20.5"
M: Sold Out
L:           24"                             24"                                 22"
XL:         25"                             27"                                 23"
2XL:       28"                             27"                                 24"

We are sure that you will love the new Black Ice Jacket

name: Angel Wings Hoodie
description:
!!!!BLOW OUT SALE!!!! WE ARE MAKING ROOM FOR A NEW LADIES HOODIE. GET THE ANGEL HOODIE WHILE IT LASTS.

We've added another splash of colour in our Buffalo line with the introduction of our women's hoodie. The red colour is a slightly faded shade, but still bright enough to cheer you up in the coming drab winter months.

We only printed the image on the back, in a distressed print to make the hoodie simple and understated.

name: DC-4 Die Cast Model C-FIQM
description:
In honour of out DC-4 we are having a "Tanker 57" Sale!
For a limited time order your DC-4 Die Cast Model for only $57
(Regularly $75) 


We have been working hard to get of out before Christmas. The making of C-FIQM, our 1:200 scale DC-4 Die Cast model, has been a labour of love to get everything correct, we wanted this to be perfect and a celebration of IQM.

We have created a special collector box as well, with a brief history of the DC-4/C-54s and IQM in particular. We also convinced our past employee and talented photographer, Sean Berry to grace the box cover with one of his photos.

There was only 1400 made, so get yours while you can!

Please note that this is a Sale on the Model only. (this does not include a free t-shirt)

name: Patches
description:
Now available are the traditional Buffalo Round patch, the Flight Pin patch, the Commando patch and the Skymaster patch. The success of the flight pin design and the farmer styled Commando and Skymaster hats has led to requests for patches, while all of these are available individually we thought that we should offer them up as a set.

Get your quality patches today and sew them on a bag, coat, shirt or just to cover that hole in your blue jeans.
All 4 are available for a discounted price.

name: Skymaster Tee
description:
Finally, we have a tee to celebrate the Dambuster DC-4 C-FIQM.

We designed the Skymaster cursive after the Douglas cursive on the nose of C-FIQM for the front of the tee. On the back of the tee we worked hard to faithfully render the Last Dambuster.

This has become an instant favourite with the staff and our walk-in clientele since it arrived and it has been hard to keep them on the shelves. Get your Skymaster Tee before they all fly off the shelf.

This tee is in sizes ranging from XS to 5XL

Size Measurements:    Small  Medium  Large  X-Large  2XL 
                        Length 28"      29"       30"      31"         32" 
                         Width 18"      20"        22"     24"         26"

name: Boot Brown Baseball Cap
description:
We keep trying to introduce new designs and here is one of our latest hat designs, the Boot Brown Baseball Cap. This stylish baseball cap is made out of brushed cotton which looks like leather, or oilskin canvas. The material is slightly distressed to give it that worn in look and feel, but the Buffalo brand and logo are crisply embroidered. The back has an adjustable Velcro strap to fit almost any head. 

We kept this design clean and simple as per the request of many fans who shop in the store and on line.

We think that we have a winner here. Let us know what you think.

name: Flex-Fit Caps
description:
Here at Buffalo Airwear we have come to understand our hat wearing customers. All hats are not made equal and so to level the playing field we have brought in Flex-Fit Caps. 

We have had a Flex-Fit before, and we have seen the need for more so we brought in a popular style in a comfortable feel. 

These black caps are simple in design and pleasing to the eye, with just the buffalo logo on the front left and will fit large and shapely heads comfortably without tricky adjustment straps to play around with. This new Flex Fit design comes in two sizes: S/M for those regular sized heads and L/XL for the larger variety.

name: Balsa Wood Gliders
description:
We finally brought in a model that is kid friendly, and can take a rough landing or two. 

Inexpensive and lightweight, these balsa gliders are perfect for a windy day and wont tax your throwing arm. 

We recommend buying them as an add on purchase as they won't ship too well alone.

name: Cup 'O Joe To Go & Propeller Blend Combo
description:
What better to get you going in the morning than a quality cup of coffee in a Buffalo To Go Mug? After much research we found an amazing blend of organically grown and fairly traded coffee beans. We then had this quality blend of beans lovingly roasted by our friends at Velvet Sunshine Coffee Roasters in Stouffville, Ontario please visit them at www.velvetsunrise.ca.

This special blend was given the name of 'Propeller' because it will give a lift and keep you aloft. We recommend that you give this blend a try, we know that you won't be disappointed.

Note: You can purchase the Propeller Blend by itself but there is a marked savings when purchased with our new To Go Mug.

Propeller blend. A proprietary blend of fine quality specialty grade beans from our certified Organic Fair Trade producers in Brazil, Colombia and Honduras. Each coffee is cupped for quality and premium taste before being blended to a full, rich, balanced roast profile. The coffee is carefully roasted in small batches on our vintage Probat roaster under the watchful eye of our Roast Master. The coffee is packed and shipped immediately in order to get that fresh roasted taste and aroma to the customer as quickly as possible. 
 
Our Cup o Joe Coffee Brand  supports sustainable farming practices including organic, fair trade and rainforest alliance. We guarantee our coffee is fresh roasted and sourced from the best beans around the world!

name: Propeller Blend Coffee Beans
description:
What better to get you going in the morning than a quality cup of coffee. After much research we found an amazing blend of organically grown and fairly traded coffee beans. We then had this quality blend of beans lovingly roasted by our friends at Velvet Sunshine Coffee Roasters in Stouffville, Ontario please visit them at www.velvetsunrise.ca.

This special blend was given the name of 'Propeller' because it will give a lift and keep you aloft. We recommend that you give this blend a try, we know that you won't be disappointed.

Note: While you can purchase the Propeller Blend by itself we also have it as part of a combo deal with our new Cup 'O Joe To Go Mug for a great price.

Propeller blend. A proprietary blend of fine quality specialty grade beans from our certified Organic Fair Trade producers in Brazil, Colombia and Honduras. Each coffee is cupped for quality and premium taste before being blended to a full, rich, balanced roast profile. The coffee is carefully roasted in small batches on our vintage Probat roaster under the watchful eye of our Roast Master. The coffee is packed and shipped immediately in order to get that fresh roasted taste and aroma to the customer as quickly as possible. 
 
Our Cup o Joe Coffee Brand  supports sustainable farming practices including organic, fair trade and rainforest alliance. We guarantee our coffee is fresh roasted and sourced from the best beans around the world!

name: Cup 'O Joe To Go (Ceramic Travel Mug)
description:
Way Up Here, where hours of travel are necessary for most people to get to work everyday we have been repeatedly asked for a TO GO coffee/tea mug to help get the day on the way.

We chose an 11oz double walled porcelain mug with glossy finish and silicone lid. Looks just like a paper cup, but you can use it over and over again. Environmentally friendly and reusable as well as a great looking desktop item. Sleeve is removable for easy cleaning, as well as containing the new Buffalo Stamp Design and the Buffalo Airways brand.

This sleek, no handle ceramic TO GO mug is available for purchase alone so that you can get your day on the go like Joe. AND also available for a special price when you also purchase our Cup 'o Joe organic, fair trade coffee.

Get your mug today and fill it with your favourite Cup 'O Joe to go to start your day the right way!

name: Buffalo Airways - Home of Ice Pilots
description:
**NOTE: International shipping prices reflect UPS shipping, guaranteed 3 business day delivery. 
All Canadian and US orders will be shipped Canada Post
ON SALE FOR A LIMITED TIME! 

Buffalo Airways - Home of Ice Pilots is an in depth photographic presentation of the "real life" at Buffalo Airways. Immerse yourself in the history of Buffalo Airways and its vintage aircraft.

Ride along on some of Buffalo's most exciting missions, such as battling the Yellowknife Landfill Fire with CL-215s or hauling 500,000 pounds of mining equipment with a C-46 and a DC-4 into a remote and rapidly melting ice strip.

To complete your Buffalo experience, learn about your favourite Ice Pilots characters by exploring their biographies.

This high quality hardcover is filled with over 200 great images by twenty-one different photographers and is a must have for any Ice Pilots or vintage aircraft fan.

PLEASE NOTE: FOR SOME INTERNATIONAL DESTINATIONS, THE BOOK IS JUST OVER 4 LBS. THE WEIGHT LIMIT TO SOME DESTINATIONS IS 4 LBS 6 OZ., IF OVER THIS WEIGHT WE WILL CONTACT YOU TO WORK OUT THE SHIPPING COST BEFORE PACKAGING AND SHIPPING. PLEASE FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US BEFORE ORDERING AT 1 867 873 6113 (Mountain Standard Time) OR EMAIL P.MAGILL@BUFFALOAIRWAYS.COM.

European customers can now order from Christian-Schmidt in Germany.
http://www.christian-schmidt.com

options.name: Buffalo Airways - Home of Ice Pilots

name: DC-3 Specialist ShortSleeve - T-shirt of the Month
description:
T-shirt of the Month!

We have had this design in the store for a while in a longsleeve design, but with the warmer weather approaching fast, even thought he ice is still on the lake, we brought in this short sleeve design that is perfect for those hot, sunny days. 

We kept this simple and to the point for all of the DC-3 Specialists out there with only the front of the tee screen printed. 

These 100 % cotton tees have the labels screen printed and come in sizes ranging from XSmall to 5 Xtra Large.

name: Farmer Hats
description:
Farmer Hats are Back!!

We have had so many customers ask us if our in-store collection of old styled Farmer's hats are for sale that we thought we should design a new one. We thought that we would also make them in the colours of our famous DC-4 IQM and C-46 TXW complete with the Commando and Skymaster cursive script. We roughed them up a bit to give them the authentic look.

The Commando version has a 46 embroidered on the left-hand brim. Get your summer hat today and beat the heat with this long brimmed, mesh backed Buffalo classic.

The Skymaster version has a 57 embroidered on the left-hand brim. This is the tail number of IQM - The newest Dam Buster. Get your summer hat today and beat the heat with this long brimmed, mesh backed Buffalo classic.

These hats have an adjustable strap on the back to fit most head sizes.

name: Buffalo Shot Glasses
description:
These shot glasses hold 2 oz of liquid. 
The front featuring the Buffalo Airways brand and logo. The back of the glass features measurements appropriate for status in the Buffalo chain of command.

Captain
Co-Pilot
Flight Attendant
Rampie

Remember to think like a Captain and drink like a Rampie.

name: Second Hay River Coin
description:
These limited edition coins featuring Buffalo Joe's children, Rod, Kathy and Mikey, were minted by the Hay River Chamber of Commerce to commemorate Buffalo Airways.

The face of the coin features a relief of a DC-3, and the images of Rod, Kathy and Mikey McBryan. The back of the coin features the Hay River Chamber of Commerce logo and slogan - "Business Capital of the North."  

We have purchased a small number of the 3000 coins to sell to fans as a collectable. This is the perfect gift for a real fan of the show and Buffalo Airways and also an addition to those who have purchased the first coin. We have kept the price at just several bucks above face value on the coin (due to the limited number and collectable nature of the coin). Unfortunately the only place that you could spend this money is Hay River, so if you visit before the coin's expiry date on March 31, 2014 you can spend it on goods or services in town.

If you think you want one of these, make sure you order as soon as possible because they will not last long.

Note: due to the low price of this item we suggest that you ship with another item to make it worth the shipping costs.

name: Buffalo Flight Pin
description:
We have been working on a new wing pin design and after many hours and a lot of reworking we think that we have a great design. 

This unique design incorporates the Buffalo brand and logo on painted enamel with wings. The pin is 2 1/4 wide and 1 1/4 long making it the perfect size for attaching to a favourite coat, bag, hat, ... well, where ever you would like to have the Buffalo colours flying. 

We recommend that you order this with other items so that the shipping cost is not as much as the pin.

name: Flying Overloaded Book
description:
Arctic pilot Don Hamilton's book 'Flying Overloaded' is an exciting journal of flying in Canada's Arctic. Packed with hair-raising episodes, some so unbelievable it makes you wonder how he ever survived. You will find many of the stories are about stark terror. Although some of Don's flying may have been boring the book certainly is not.

It tells of Don's days of flying in the Far North for various companies, including training pilots on the DC-3 for Buffalo Airways in their early days, and in support of his two fly-in lodges with his own aircraft. This by itself was exciting; more so when you realize he overloaded most of the time and flew in bad weather simply because there was no other choice.

A remarkable story of the Arctic in the pioneering days of the early bush pilots by one of the most memorable characters who made the north accessible.

Forward by 'Buffalo' Joe McBryan.

name: Buffalo Messenger Bag
description:
Just in time for for the Holidays the Buffalo Messenger bag is back in stock!

Now for a limited time when you purchase your messenger bag receive a free flight pin attached to your bag. 

We have been looking for a multi-purpose messenger bag for a while and we have finally found it. This messenger style bag is just the accessory for the student, worker or commuter. Made of heavy duty canvas this bag is more than big enough to hold a 15" laptop, books and a lunch, plus plenty of pockets to carry everything you will need. The bag has a briefcase handle and a shoulder strap for ease of use.There is also a heavy duty expansion zipper to allow the bag to expand if you need to carry more than just a day's supplies.

This Buffalo branded messenger bag will become your new best friend and it's built to go with you anywhere.

name: Toques
description:
With winter coming on in most parts of the country, if not the world, we thought that we should bring in a few toque styles

These Canadian made simple toques have been stitched for us out of Merino wool and embroidered with a simple Buffalo logo on the headband. Up Here everyone needs a good `block-heater` for your head and these are a few toque designs that do not have the traditional Northern earflaps.

name: Buffalo Adventurer Jacket
description:
Sorry if you have missed buying this great jacket. It is currently sold out but we are expecting some new stock in the new year. Please check out some of our other great jackets!!

We worked with the great Canadian clothing manufacturing team at Choko Design/Icerock and are quite pleased with the final product. Now that the staff has had their chance to pick over them we happen to have a few left over for sale.

This is Choko's top of the line winter jacket with the signature blanket lining, Buffalo colouring and logos. The embroidery has been done in a 10,000 stitch count to create an impeccable design and feel.

Get out on the trails with a Buffalo on your back! 

Sizing Chart:

Chest

S      - 36" - 38" 
M     - 39" - 41" 
L      - 42" - 44"
XL    - 46" - 48"
2XL  -50" - 52"
3XL  -54" - 56"

Please note that the cost of shipping to countries other than Canada and the USA is increased because the weight of the jacket requires us to ship via UPS.

name: Commando C-46 Zip-Up Hoodie
description:
The success of the Commando C-46 tee lead us to create a new zip-up hoodie with a similar design. We took the Commando stylized text and put it on the front of the Canadian-made King Fashion hoodie with the green hood insert and printed the back with the C-46 image. (The King Fashion Zip-Up hoodie is created by the same people who brought you the Icon Hoodie.)

The simple design on the front combined with the hood insert and the mighty C-46 image have proved to be very popular with not only the staff, but the customers as well ... we have had trouble getting them out of the boxes and onto the shelves.

Don't wait too long to order this new design, as it seems that we will have to place another order soon ... 

Size Measurements: (length x width) 
Small 25.5" x 21" Medium 26.5" x 23" Large 27.75" x 25" X-Large 28.5" x 27" 2XL 29.25" x 29"

name: "Icon" Black DC-3 Hoodie
description:
Mikey’s wardrobe for the entire first season of Ice Pilots NWT. 

This thick, high quality, cotton, Canadian made pull-over is designed to keep every inch of your upper body warm and it has a hood, custom lined with Buffalo green material. This allows you to pull it up to protect your head from the wind. Wear it down and make everyone ‘green’ with envy.  

The hoodie has the Buffalo Airways logo on the front and the famous DC-3 on the back, an iconic piece in the Buffalo Airwear line. Simple, practical and stylish, this is a customer favourite and sells out very quickly, so get your order in today.

You too could now have a little Mikey at home.

We now have sizing for children! Youth Medium and Youth Large to keep there little bodies warm. 

Available in sizes ranging from small to ‘The Big Boy’ (5XL). 

* Please NOTE that Sizes
Youth Medium
Youth Large
3XL
4XL
5XL
Does not have Green Hood insert

The Icon hoodie is made in Canada by King Fashion Manufacturing and has become the most popular item we carry at Buffalo Airwear.

Size Measurements: (length x width)  Small  25.5" x  21"  Medium  26.5" x   23" Large   27.75"  x   25" X-Large  28.5" x  27" 2XL  29.25" x  29"

name: "Buffalo Wings" Black
description:
The Buffalo Wing tee is one of our longest running designs and a customer favourite.

This high quality tee is made from 100% cotton and comes in sizes ranging from small to 5XL! This tee is built to make you look great wearing it and even better if you are working in it. 

We have these ranging in sizes Xtra Small to 3XL. We decided to bring in the XS sizing for youngsters who want to wear what Mom and Dad are wearing. This size is also perfect for petite women and men.

Get your wings today and fly with Buffalo!

Size Measurements:    Small  Medium  Large  X-Large  2XL 
                        Length 28"      29"       30"      31"         32" 
                         Width 18"      20"        22"     24"         26"

name: Classic DC-3 Tee
description:
This high quality green coloured cotton with the art deco DC-3 image in black and white is our best selling tee shirt. This stylized tee will have you looking your best in the traditional Buffalo green.  

The Classic DC-3 tee continues to outsell all of our other tees. We suggest that you join the crowd and GO GREEN WITH BUFFALO!

Size Measurements:    Small  Medium  Large  X-Large  2XL 
                        Length 28"      29"       30"      31"         32" 
                         Width 18"      20"        22"     24"         26" 

Now Available in Youth sizes! $15CAD

Youth Extra Small: Width 16" Length 20"
Youth Small: Width 17" Length 21"
Youth Medium: Width 18" Length 24"

name: Flying Buffalo Tee
description:
We now have this tee design available in Xtra Small (XS), perfect for petite women and men as well as youngsters who want to wear a more adult design than the Lil' Buffalo cartoon.

We have been wanting to expand on the popular Buffalo Wing idea and our friends at Get Bold helped us to realize the Flying Buffalo tee. Their artists rendered a charging buffalo complete with Pegasus-like wings and a Maple Leaf on its forehead and the Buffalo logo.

This detailed and yet simple design is destined to be a favourite (we can tell because all of the staff are asking for one after seeing the design). 

We recommend that you get your wings on today and join the Buffalos in the sky.

Size Measurements:    Small  Medium  Large  X-Large  2XL 
                        Length 28"      29"       30"      31"         32" 
                         Width 18"      20"        22"     24"         26"

name: DC-3 Draft Tee
description:
The Draft Hoodie has been such a new popular item that we thought we would introduce the same image on a short sleeve tee. These 100% cotton tees have screen printed labels in side and the iconic DC-3 schematic on the front. We have them in sizes: Small, Medium, Large, Xtra Large, 2 Xtra Large and 3 Xtra Large.

If there is a brown-out or a huge sun spot in the near future at least you will have the blueprint of one of the best made aircraft on your tee shirt. You can gather up your neighbours and friends to help build a DC-3 to fly out. 

Size Measurements:    Small  Medium  Large  X-Large  2XL 
                        Length 28"      29"       30"      31"         32" 
                         Width 18"      20"        22"     24"         26"

name: Ice Pilots Book
description:
The book has finally arrived!

This book is a carefully written glimpse behind the scenes of Buffalo Airways and what brought it to the cusp of an international television success. Mike V. performed a series of in-depth interviews to slip back the curtain and reveal the real people and experiences at Buffalo Airways.

Order this page turner today and we will ship as soon as possible. Order soon before the staff scoop up all the copies in stock.

NOTE: Use the discount code: DMBOOKDEAL to receive your discount on this item today!

name: Buffalo Joe Signature Hat
description:
We had a limited edition designer hat made last year to celebrate Buffalo Airways 40th Anniversary. The limited quantity we had sold out in weeks and well frankly I have been pestered ever since by those who didn't buy one at the time.

This 100 % cotton baseball design is a washed light green colour and has the logo embroidered on the front with the 'a' in Buffalo replaced with a metal badge embossed with the Buffalo brand. The brim is lined with a faux suede that wraps around and is embroidered in a deep burgundy thread. The right hand side of the brim has an embroidered Buffalo brand and the left hand side has Buffalo Joe's signature stitched in cursive writing. 

This is a classic hat to celebrate the next 40 years of Buffalo Airways.

name: Premier Buffalo DC-3 Hat (Black/Green)
description:
We wanted to update this Buffalo classic that is worn almost 100% of the time by Mikey on Season 1 of Ice Pilots NWT. 

It still has the green embroidered Buffalo Logo on the front, but instead of "Yellowknife NWT" under the Canada flag on the right we simply put "NWT" ... just to be fair to the whole territory. On the left side where the Sliver DC-4 was we replaced that with a DC-3 and instead of"Buffalo Airways" on the back we decided to promote the Buffalo Airwear site. The inside brim and webbing are now in the traditional Buffalo green. The new DC-3 hat still has an adjustable velcro strap in the back and is a "One size fits Most". 

So, besides those few changes this is still the same great hat that has been our best seller for two years now. We believe that this one will be as popular as the DC-4, maybe even more.

name: Futra Hat
description:
The classic DC 4 hat now has something to give it a run for its money.  We wanted a hat with a bit more 'flash' and the Futra does just that with its green stripes, 40th anniversary patch and DC 3 stitched with loving care.

This is for the Buffalo fan that is looking for a little bit more or wanting to make a bold statement. 

Our first shipment of these flew off the shelf before we had time to upload them to the website. Don't worry, we ordered lots to make sure our out of town customers have a chance of ordering.

This is the 'Futra.'

name: Mean Green Ripstyle Hat
description:
Don't stress. Get distressed!

We thought that a military ripsytle hat would be the perfect fit to the age of all the 'Old Birds' in our fleet. These high quality caps come in  a washed green cotton that have been lightly distressed. They are stitched with the Buffalo Airways logo in green and silver on the front left and a Canadian flag, NWT and our web address on the back. These hats are larger than our last version and come with an adjustable strap to adjust to almost all head sizes.

Note: We requested that they be distressed, so that they looked like they were worn in and a comfy fit for your head. They are not previously owned. 

Come on and join the team and get that melon of yours into a ripstyle hat while they last.

name: The Mackenzie River Guide
description:
The Mackenzie River Guide: A Paddler's Guide to Canada's Longest River. Written by Michelle Swallow and Illustrated by Farah Denkovski. 

The Mackenzie River Guide documents the route, history and stories of the Mackenzie River. Full colour with more than 60 maps of the river (1:250).  The Mackenzie River Guidebook is a must have for all Northern enthusiasts, paddlers and power-boaters.

name: Buffalo Airway's Hot Sauce
description:
We taste tested a variety of sauce recipes ranging from the blow your head off, blow your socks off and, well ... a number of places in between. It was the garlic habanero sauce and the jalapeno that won over our taste buds. 

These sauces are the perfect compliment for fish, poultry, beef, wild game, dips and sauces. This blend has lots of taste with a medium tang, just enough to enhance and not overpower or deaden your taste buds.

Spice up your day with a little Buffalo Airways Hot Sauce!

name: Formal Buffalo Golf Shirt - Green
description:
This shirt is professional enough for the office or the golf course and yet comfortable enough for everyday wear.

This quality golf tee has been made with 100% cotton with comfortably knitted sleeves and collar and a three button neckline in a picque weave.

Now you can look stylish on and off the course. Perfect for the fairways, greens, clubhouse and even the occasional wedding. 

12 oz, 100% combed ring spun cotton pique
Clean finished placket with reinforced bottom box
3 wood tone buttons
Lay-flat contoured collar
Welt cuffs that keep their shape
Double-needle bottom hem for increased durability

Size Measurements:
  	
               Small Medium  Large  X-Large  2XL    3XL
Length    27.5" 29"          30"     31"         32"   33.5" 
Width     18"     20"          22"     24"         26"   27"

name: Lil' Buffalo Kids tees
description:
We have been asked for kids clothing continually over the past year.  After a great deal of thought and design we have finally produced our new Li'l Buffalo tee.

These high quality tees come in 100 % cotton with the cleverly designed cartoon image of the DC-3. We chose green because it isn't blue and it isn't pink and therefore it is unisex, but most of all it is Buffalo's traditional colour.

These are sure to be a favourite for your little Rampies or Pilots at home.  Just like Rampies and Pilots here we recommend that you buy a few to make sure they are wearing a clean one.

These tees come in Xtra-Small, Youth Small, Youth Medium and Youth Large.

PS. We also have Youth sizing in the Classic DC-3 and Icon Hoodies if you are looking for something long sleeved and warm.

Size Measurements:   
             X-Small   Small   Medium   Large   X-Large 
Length   19.5"       21.5"     23"          25"       26.5" 
Width     15.5"       17"       18"          19"       20"

name: Buffalo Wings Crewneck Sweatshirt
description:
We took one of our best selling tee designs, the Buffalo Wings, and put it on high quality, 100% pre-shrunk cotton sweatshirts.

This sweatshirt is a replica of the Buffalo Wings tee, but with thick material and long sleeves. The sleeve cuffs and hemline are all finished with ribbed stitching for comfort, style and to help take the wear & tear of daily use.

These new crewneck sweatshirts have become hot items in the store, quickly selling out before I could load them up on the website. We have ordered enough this time to introduce them to our clients outside of the NWT.

Get on your wings and get ready to fly!

Limited stock only 3XL left. Sorry if we don't have your size.

name: DC-3 Specialist LONGsleeve
description:
The success of our Oshkosh tee design over the past year led us to take the front image and place it on an new long sleeved tee. We kept this simple and to the point for all of the DC-3 Specialists out there with only the front of the tee screen printed. While this may not be perfect for the full sun, it is ideal in the cooler evenings or seasons. 

This tee is the first long sleeve we have had in stock in quite a while and if this is successful then we will introduce more designs. These 100 % cotton tees have the labels screen printed and come in sizes ranging from Small to 2 Xtra Large.

name: Buffalo Water Bottle
description:
In keeping with our theme of late, we have brought in just about everything you might need to hold a drink. These new water bottles complete the set and will never leave you dry. 

The simple logo compliments the sleek bottle design well, and simple colours dont overwhelm. 

This light-weight, spun aluminum water bottle is the perfect accessory for the traveler, hiker, bicycler, walker, or just for you to bring water to work or the gym.

So add one to your order and keep hydrated!

name: Buffalo Team Jersey
description:
Back by popular demand, the Buffalo Team Jersey. 

For the last Polar Pond Hockey Tournament we designed a jersey for our Buffalo Airways team. There was so much local interest that we thought we should make a few up and see if there was any interest beyond Hay River.

These Athletic Knit authentic jerseys just happened to come in Buffalo green and looked great with the Buffalo logo and name screen printed on the front and back. We were tempted to have some numbers printed on the back, but then we thought that maybe you would like to choose your own numbers. So we left it blank.

Get your Buffalo Team Jersey today and start your own street or ice hockey league. Perfect for watching the Stanley Cup Playoffs!

Chest measurements are(measured at armpit level): 
S: 44"
M:46"
L:48"
XL:54"
2XL: 56"

name: Radial Specialist Belt Buckle
description:
We wanted to work on a design that included all of our radial engine planes, but the buckle would have been huge if we put a DC-3, DC-4 and C-46 in the final design. We thought that 'Radial Specialists' covered all of those radials and then threw a radial with wings into the mix. We are sure that those buckle collectors out there will love this design and those who need to wear a belt will want it to hold up their pants.

These Canadian made buckles are cast of a zinc and are 3" H by 4" L.  

Get your new Buffalo belt buckle today before they all run out.

name: Hay River Buffalo Coin
description:
These limited edition coins featuring Buffalo Airways were minted by the Hay River Chamber of Commerce to commemorate Buffalo Joe and the Buffalo Airways business in the town.

The face of the coin features a relief of our flagship passenger DC-3, PNR (aka: Summer Wages) and the image of Buffalo Joe. The back of the coin features the Hay River Chamber of Commerce logo and slogan - "Business Capital of the North."  

We have purchased a small number of the 3000 coins to sell to fans as a collectable. This is the perfect gift for a real fan of the show and Buffalo Airways. We have kept the price at just several bucks above face value on the coin (due to the limited number and collectable nature of the coin). Unfortunately the only place that you could spend this money is Hay River, so if you visit before the coin's expiry date on March 31, 2013 you can spend it on some goods or services in town.

If you think you want one of these, make sure you order as soon as possible because they will not last long.

Note: due to the low price of this item we suggest that you ship with another item to make it worth the shipping costs.

name: New Aviator Hat
description:
They have finally arrive just in time for the snow up here in Yellowknife. 

We were lucky to find these beautiful 'real' leather caps with metal buckles and Thinsulate lining.

These high quality Nathaniel Cole caps are available in distressed black and brown, and each one come with the original Buffalo Logo Pin. The chin strap is leather and the back has a small strap to ensure a snug fit on your head.


size chart:
M   21 3/4" to 22 1/2"
L    22 5/8" to 23 1/4"  
XL  23 1/2" to 24" 
XXL 24 1/8" to 24 1/2"

name: Buffalo Playing Cards
description:
After getting asked for Buffalo playing cards for over a year now we decided to say, "Uncle," and have some playing cards made. 

We went with a Canadian manufacturer for these high quality cards branded with the Buffalo logo available in Black or Green.

What more can be said about this product? Great for playing Euchre, Cribbage, Rumoli, Hearts, Crazy 8 Count Down, Speed, Bullsh!t, Go Fish, Poker, Texas Hold 'em, Solitaire, ...

Get your collector's deck today!

name: Mystery T-Shirt 50% OFF!
description:
50% OFF!!!!!

Here at BuffaloAirWear.com we have overstock of some old designs. These stragglers are nearly gone and may never be made again. Here is your chance to own a true Buffalo collectors item. Just tell us what size and we will ship you one of the discounted designs. 

So good luck and hurry before they are gone for good. 

Size Measurements:      X-Small          Small  
                        Length            28"      
                         Width             18"

name: Buffalo DC-3 Metal/Enamel Pins
description:
The Pins are in! 

These high quality metal pins with enamel coating have been a prize possession for Buffalo customers and fans. 2" long by 1" wide these are faithful representations of our DC-3s complete with the Buffalo brand and colours.

Finally, we have the pins available for everyone. Shipping costs will be prohibitive to order just one, but if you order one with another item of $20 or more there are no extra shipping charges.

name: Buffalo Logo Hat Pin
description:
We had the Buffalo Logo Pin designed and then expanded to adorn the Buffalo Joe Aviator Hat. Since doing that we have had a huge request to sell this pin by itself so that people could attach the pin to a jacket, bag or even their own hat.

Well, after hearing from our customers we decided to have an extra few of these pewter pins manufactured for those interested in branding their own coat, bag, hat, kilt, scarf ... (well, use your imagination).

If you have your favourite clothing item that you wish to brand with something other than a patch, we have the solution. 

Get your wings on with this detailed Buffalo Logo Hat Pin!

Due to the low cost of this item we recommend that you add this to other items to save on the shipping costs.

name: Buffalo Logo Pin
description:
The new pin has arrived. The retro-styled metal and enamel pin is perfect as a tie/scarf pin or simply as an accessory for your lapel. 

The pin is elegantly crafted with the Buffalo in the centre painted in the traditional green, encircled by a wreath of laurel leaves and Buffalo NWT. To finish the retro look we added some Art-Deco styled wings in a Kelly green. The pin is 1" wide from wing tip to wing tip and 3/4" tall.

Help us celebrate Buffalo's 40th year in business and the 75th Anniversary of the DC-3 by proudly wearing a pin!

Shipping costs will be prohibitative to order just one, but if you order one with another item of $20 or more there are no extra shipping charges.

name: Buffalo Sticker Set
description:
We are constantly asked for stickers and we wanted to put together a high quality sticker set to offer our customers for a low price. 

This set has four stickers, three are square measuring 2" x 2" and one rectangular measuring 7" x 2". These are all laminated so that they will take a beating and keep on sticking. Ideal for you car bumper, trailer back, tool box, locker, computer, windows, ... well almost anywhere you would like to stick the Buffalo brand.

Because these are such a low priced item we recommend that you order as an add-on with another item to justify the shipping costs.

name: Panties "Buffalo Style"
description:
Hey Ladies, these are just for you.

Buffalo Air's custom American Apparel's Cotton spandex jersey panties in a boy's brief design and trimmed with Kelly green piping. Back by popular demand these ladies underwear are finally back in stock. 

-Cotton/Spandex Jersey (95% Cotton / 5% Elastane) 
-Elastic waistband
-Elastic trim
-Matching front panel
-Form-fitting

Un-stretched waist band measures:

S-12"
M-13'
L14"
XL-15"

name: Buffalo Fridge Magnet
description:
We all need something to hold our child's and friend's art up on the fridge and we have just  the item to make that happen. Here at the Buffalo hanger we required something to hold the occasional piece of art or important paperwork to fridge ... so we took images of Mikey and Joe and logo and had them put on a magnet.

As you can see in the pictures of the magnet we do have some important paperwork that needs to stay on the fridge ... someone might forget who they are.

We recommend that you add this item to an order rather than ordering by itself since the shipping charges will be astronomical. We also recommend that you keep it away from your plastic money cards since it will wipe out all of the information.

name: Buffalo Baby 1zee
description:
Just because they can’t speak doesn’t mean that they have nothing to say. We designed these Baby 1zee jumpers with just that in mind. These are American Apparel quality 1zees in the traditional Buffalo green or blush pink and screen-printed with a saying that we know to be true, “I may not be able to speak, but I can whine like a pilot.”

Out of the mouths of babes and onto your beautiful baby this will definitely create a chuckle, smile and conversation amongst your friends ... maybe not if any of them are pilots … take it from us, please use with discretion (or tell them to get a sense of humour!).

We have a range of sizing:
3 to 6 months
6 to 12 months
12 to 18 months
18 to 24 months

Anything larger we recommend that you look over our Kids sizing for the perfect fit.

name: Buffalo Boxer Briefs
description:
Whatever you call them, unmentionables, briefs, shorts, underwear, boxers, Reg Gundys, smalls, pants, drawers, undergarments, linen, trunks, ... etc. we have them in stock for men now.

For well over a year we have been selling the ever popular Buffalo Panites for women, but up until now we have had nothing to offer men to wear down there ... Well here they are, the Buffalo Boxer Briefs. These are a 100% white cotton brief with a wide, triple stitched elastic waistband screenprinted with the Buffalo green logo. Comfortable and classy.

Whether you wear them as underwear or nightwear these comfortable shorts are ready. Better than a loincloth, codpiece, jock strap, or jockeys these will allow you to get some air into your briefs (No! Not that kind of air). If you are looking for a looser fit to your undergarments then the Buffalo Boxer Briefs will fill the bill.

Ready for the trousers or 'the ring' these trunks will give you coverage without holding everything too close. 

"Get some AIR down there!"

Note: Wash in cold water and hang dry (or in the dryer on cool to medium heat. If necessary). Iron inside out on low heat to protect the brand.

name: Buffalo Postcard
description:
This image of WZS has been a staple brand over the past year, but we are considering having another image for the next round of postcards ... that will make this one a collectable. Get one while they are still in stock.

Do your friends and family keep complaining that you are not keeping in touch? Well, we have just to solution for that problem ... a Buffalo Postcard. 

This is the real, old school deal. Printed on glossy card stock with the image of JKM on the front with our logo and on the back plenty of room to write a short note to Mother or the x-girlfriend ... don't be shy, send out a few to family and friends to let them know that you are alright and things are groovy (OK, you don't have to say that, but you get the drift).

Once again, this is an add on item to your order and not a stand alone order due to the cost of shipping. But, at this price you could order enough to let all of those who want to know what's going on in your life a card.

We also have Buffalo stamps for our Canadian customers or stamp collectors. For an extra $1.50 you can have an official Canada Post/Bank of Canada stamp attached to your post card. These stamps are good forever for the delivery of one 30g letter across Canada. We also have Keepsake Buffalo Stamp Sheets that have 21 stamps and a large image of the iconic Buffalo image. We are selling these for $40.00 each. They look great framed and are a great conversation piece or as part of a collection.

name: Buffalo Safety Vest
description:
Start your year off by being safe. We have discounted the Buffalo Safety Vest for a limited time to afford everyone the opportunity to be dressed safe and stylish in the New Year!

Just because new regulations force you to wear a safety vest at work doesn't mean you can't look good while complying. We found some light-weight, reflective-striped and colourful vests and we branded them with the Buffalo logo.

These safety vests are made with 100% polyester but are designed with a mesh design so that they breathe, we also made sure they had adjustable velcro for proper sizing and even included pockets.

Be the first one on the tarmac or shop floor to meet safety guidelines in Buffalo style, but please remember, "Safety First."

name: DC-3 Collector Models (1:80)
description:
A 1:80 size resin model, the detail is more easily seen than our 1:200 scale Die Cast and a little more forgiving with tiny hands.

The propellers and wheels move and the planes have been painstakingly painted with the traditional Buffalo colours and patterns. The stand is removable so that the DC-3 can sit right on its wheels.

The body is approximately 10" long and the wingspan is approximately 14". The model on the stand sits approximately 5.5" high.
